<p> Background simulates ground and sky, using vertical arrays of wraparound color values. Background can also provide url addresses for backdrop textures on all six sides. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#Background" target="_blank">Background</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/enveffects.html" target="_blank">24 Environmental effects component</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/enveffects.html#Concepts" target="_blank">24.2 Concepts</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/enveffects.html#X3DBackgroundNode" target="_blank">24.3.1 X3DBackgroundNode</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/enveffects.html#Background" target="_blank">24.4.1 Background</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> VRML 2 Sourcebook:&nbsp; <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter22Background" target="_blank">Chapter 22 Background</a> </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter11LightingEnvironmentalEffects" target="_blank">Chapter 11 Lighting Environmental Effects</a> </li> </ul>
